scripts.test: cat adapters/ns.js src/base.js src/promise.js adapters/adapter.js > build/promise.test.js && promises-aplus-tests build/promise.test.js
scripts.test-compiled: grunt compile && cat adapters/ns.js build/promise.js adapters/adapter.js > test/promise.test.js && promises-aplus-tests test/promise.test.js
